EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_DE_Digital Transformation Forum_Q216.Confirmation - English
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/de/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Last Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Digital Transformation Forum in Frankfurt. See event details below:
Date: 8 June 2016 Time: 8h30 to 15h45 Location: Hilton Frankfurt Airport Hotel <[[http://www3.hilton.com/en/hotels/hesse/hilton-frankfurt-airport-FRAHAHI/index.html]]>
AGENDA <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]>
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:ischuller@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
